snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z Budokai HD collection - PS3 / X360 - Dragon Ball Z Budokai is back!
snippet.description:
With enhanced and re-mastered HD visuals, alongside full Trophy and Achievements support, Dragon Ball Z Budokai HD Collection brings two legendary anime fighting titles to the PlayStation®3 and Xbox 360® for the first time in one great package. No fan of the series can afford to miss it.

Dragon Ball Z Budokai HD collection will be available Playstation 3 and Xbox 360 this Winter.

For more information, please join the facebook page http://www.facebook.com/DBZ.videogames, visit the official website http://www.dragonball-videogames.com or your local Namco Bandai website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
